Welcome!

This is a site about STORIES

This site is all about stories. The good, the bad, and the "so bad they're good." I'll be posting reviews of shows, films, games, and books that I've devoured. My critiques are typically systematic, going over general properties of the medium the story is told through. An in-depth guide to my approach to analysis can be found here. I'll also be posting stories of my own. Short stories, screenplays ... maybe novels. Who knows? But at the very least I'll be making things up and posting them on here. *Constructive* feedback is appreciated. And finally there's a blog. This may have some story related stuff, like What Is a Story? or What Makes a Good Story?. But my focus will be non-fiction: philosophy, science, and odd ponderings. Be forewarned, I am a geek. All that said and done, I hope you find something you enjoy on this website. If not, cool. I hope you find something you enjoy nonetheless.
